defaultOpen.description: The open state of the tooltip when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

open.description: The controlled open state of the tooltip. Must be binded with v-model.

:delayDuration.description: Override the duration given to the `Provider` to customise the open delay for a specific tooltip.

disableHoverableContent.description: Prevents TooltipContent from remaining open when hovering. Disabling this has accessibility consequences. Inherits from TooltipProvider.

disableClosingTrigger.description: Prevents TooltipTrigger from closing content when clicked. Disabling this has accessibility consequences. Inherits from TooltipProvider.
